channel.title: I need help with my first script
channel.description:
Ok so far ive been making my first bot witch is an auto crumbler i used cords for it to click the symbol in mage book but i need to use colors for it to click monsters wats the comand for it to click color? Like instead of clickmouse(444,444) wat would u pick for it to click color? i no its noob question but thnx to whoiever responds my script will eb freee!
ok now that uve awnsered my first question i have another so ppl using ym script sont have to go through all the code to change colors how would i make a spot in the setup that changes the code in the script would i use ''?

And remember to include SRL.

item.source: I need help with my first script

item.title: I need help with my first script
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

If FindColorTolerance(x, y, COLORHERE, 1, 1, 516, 338, 5) Then Begin Mouse(x, y, 3, 3, true); End;

If the color is found within the given dimensions(1, 1, 516, 338), the coordinates would be returned in x and y. This procedure also allows a tolerance when finding the color, which in the example above would be a tolerance of 5. Experiment with that.

You can also use FindColorSpiralTolerance with the same parameters. The difference is that the script would start looking for the color at the current coordinates of x and y and then spiral out. This way, before you use that procedure, you could give x and y coordinates of a place on the screen that the monster is usually close to. Therefore eliminating some of the similar colors in a different spot.

Hope this helped,

-Weibs.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with my first script
